383 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
384 SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::SerialSpdDenseSolver()
385  : CompObject(),
386  Object("Teuchos::SerialSpdDenseSolver"),
387  equilibrate_(false),
388  shouldEquilibrate_(false),
389  equilibratedA_(false),
390  equilibratedB_(false),
391  transpose_(false),
392  factored_(false),
393  estimateSolutionErrors_(false),
394  solutionErrorsEstimated_(false),
395  solved_(false),
396  inverted_(false),
397  reciprocalConditionEstimated_(false),
398  refineSolution_(false),
399  solutionRefined_(false),
400  numRowCols_(0),
401  LDA_(0),
402  LDAF_(0),
403  INFO_(0),
404  LWORK_(0),
405  ANORM_(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero()),
406  RCOND_(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero()),
407  SCOND_(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero()),
408  AMAX_(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero()),
409  A_(0),
410  AF_(0)
411 {
412  resetMatrix();
413 }

422 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
423 void SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::resetVectors()
424 {
425  LHS_ = Teuchos::null;
426  RHS_ = Teuchos::null;
427  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = false;
428  solutionRefined_ = false;
429  solved_ = false;
430  solutionErrorsEstimated_ = false;
431  equilibratedB_ = false;
432 }
433 //=============================================================================
434 
435 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
436 void SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::resetMatrix()
437 {
438  resetVectors();
439  equilibratedA_ = false;
440  factored_ = false;
441  inverted_ = false;
442  numRowCols_ = 0;
443  LDA_ = 0;
444  LDAF_ = 0;
445  ANORM_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
446  RCOND_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
447  SCOND_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
448  AMAX_ = -ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one();
449  A_ = 0;
450  AF_ = 0;
451  INFO_ = 0;
452  LWORK_ = 0;
453  R_.resize(0);
454 }
455 //=============================================================================
456 
457 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
458 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::setMatrix(const RCP<SerialSymDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& A)
459 {
460  resetMatrix();
461  Matrix_ = A;
462  Factor_ = A;
463  numRowCols_ = A->numRows();
464  LDA_ = A->stride();
465  LDAF_ = LDA_;
466  A_ = A->values();
467  AF_ = A->values();
468  return(0);
469 }
470 //=============================================================================
471 
472 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
473 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::setVectors(const RCP<SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& X,
474  const RCP<SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType> >& B)
475 {
476  // Check that these new vectors are consistent.
477  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->numRows()!=X->numRows() || B->numCols() != X->numCols(), std::invalid_argument,
478  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X and B are not the same size!");
479  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->values()==0, std::invalid_argument,
480  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: B is an empty SerialDenseMatrix<T>!");
481  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(X->values()==0, std::invalid_argument,
482  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X is an empty SerialDenseMatrix<T>!");
483  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(B->stride()<1, std::invalid_argument,
484  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: B has an invalid stride!");
485  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(X->stride()<1, std::invalid_argument,
486  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::setVectors: X has an invalid stride!");
487 
488  resetVectors();
489  LHS_ = X;
490  RHS_ = B;
491  return(0);
492 }
493 //=============================================================================
494 
495 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
496 void SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::estimateSolutionErrors(bool flag)
497 {
498  estimateSolutionErrors_ = flag;
499 
500  // If the errors are estimated, this implies that the solution must be refined
501  refineSolution_ = refineSolution_ || flag;
502 }
503 //=============================================================================
504 
505 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
506 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::factor() {
507 
508  if (factored()) return(0); // Already factored
509 
510  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(inverted(), std::logic_error,
511  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::factor: Cannot factor an inverted matrix!");
512 
513  ANORM_ = Matrix_->normOne(); // Compute 1-Norm of A
514 
515 
516  // If we want to refine the solution, then the factor must
517  // be stored separatedly from the original matrix
518 
519  if (A_ == AF_)
520  if (refineSolution_ ) {
521  Factor_ = rcp( new SerialSymDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>(*Matrix_) );
522  AF_ = Factor_->values();
523  LDAF_ = Factor_->stride();
524  }
525 
526  int ierr = 0;
527  if (equilibrate_) ierr = equilibrateMatrix();
528 
529  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr);
530 
531  INFO_ = 0;
532  this->POTRF(Matrix_->UPLO(), numRowCols_, AF_, LDAF_, &INFO_);
533  factored_ = true;
534 
535  return(INFO_);
536 }
537 
538 //=============================================================================
539 
540 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
541 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::solve() {
542 
543  // We will call one of four routines depending on what services the user wants and
544  // whether or not the matrix has been inverted or factored already.
545  //
546  // If the matrix has been inverted, use DGEMM to compute solution.
547  // Otherwise, if the user want the matrix to be equilibrated or wants a refined solution, we will
548  // call the X interface.
549  // Otherwise, if the matrix is already factored we will call the TRS interface.
550  // Otherwise, if the matrix is unfactored we will call the SV interface.
551 
552  int ierr = 0;
553  if (equilibrate_) {
554  ierr = equilibrateRHS();
555  equilibratedB_ = true;
556  }
557  if (ierr != 0) return(ierr); // Can't equilibrate B, so return.
558 
559  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( (equilibratedA_ && !equilibratedB_) || (!equilibratedA_ && equilibratedB_) ,
560  std::logic_error, "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::solve: Matrix and vectors must be similarly scaled!");
561  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( RHS_==Teuchos::null, std::invalid_argument,
562  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::solve: No right-hand side vector (RHS) has been set for the linear system!");
563  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( LHS_==Teuchos::null, std::invalid_argument,
564  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::solve: No solution vector (LHS) has been set for the linear system!");
565 
566  if (shouldEquilibrate() && !equilibratedA_)
567  std::cout << "WARNING! SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::solve: System should be equilibrated!" << std::endl;
568 
569  if (inverted()) {
570 
571  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( RHS_->values() == LHS_->values(), std::invalid_argument,
572  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::solve: X and B must be different vectors if matrix is inverted.");
573 
574  INFO_ = 0;
575  this->GEMM(Teuchos::NO_TRANS, Teuchos::NO_TRANS, numRowCols_, RHS_->numCols(),
576  numRowCols_, 1.0, AF_, LDAF_, RHS_->values(), RHS_->stride(), 0.0,
577  LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride());
578  if (INFO_!=0) return(INFO_);
579  solved_ = true;
580  }
581  else {
582 
583  if (!factored()) factor(); // Matrix must be factored
584 
585  if (RHS_->values()!=LHS_->values()) {
586  (*LHS_) = (*RHS_); // Copy B to X if needed
587  }
588  INFO_ = 0;
589  this->POTRS(Matrix_->UPLO(), numRowCols_, RHS_->numCols(), AF_, LDAF_, LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride(), &INFO_);
590  if (INFO_!=0) return(INFO_);
591  solved_ = true;
592 
593  }
594  int ierr1=0;
595  if (refineSolution_ && !inverted()) ierr1 = applyRefinement();
596  if (ierr1!=0)
597  return(ierr1);
598 
599  if (equilibrate_) ierr1 = unequilibrateLHS();
600  return(ierr1);
601 }
602 //=============================================================================
603 
604 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
605 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::applyRefinement()
606 {
607  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!solved(), std::logic_error,
608  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::applyRefinement: Must have an existing solution!");
609  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(A_==AF_, std::logic_error,
610  "SerialSpdDenseSolver<T>::applyRefinement: Cannot apply refinement if no original copy of A!");
611 
612  OrdinalType NRHS = RHS_->numCols();
613  FERR_.resize( NRHS );
614  BERR_.resize( NRHS );
615  allocateWORK();
616  allocateIWORK();
617 
618  INFO_ = 0;
619  this->PORFS(Matrix_->UPLO(), numRowCols_, NRHS, A_, LDA_, AF_, LDAF_,
620  RHS_->values(), RHS_->stride(), LHS_->values(), LHS_->stride(),
621  &FERR_[0], &BERR_[0], &WORK_[0], &IWORK_[0], &INFO_);
622 
623  solutionErrorsEstimated_ = true;
624  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = true;
625  solutionRefined_ = true;
626 
627  return(INFO_);
628 
629 }
630 
631 //=============================================================================
632 
633 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
634 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::computeEquilibrateScaling()
635 {
636  if (R_.size()!=0) return(0); // Already computed
637 
638  R_.resize( numRowCols_ );
639 
640  INFO_ = 0;
641  this->POEQU (numRowCols_, AF_, LDAF_, &R_[0], &SCOND_, &AMAX_, &INFO_);
642  if (SCOND_<0.1*ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::one() ||
643  AMAX_ < ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::rmin() ||
644  AMAX_ > ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::rmax())
645  shouldEquilibrate_ = true;
646 
647  return(INFO_);
648 }
649 
650 //=============================================================================
651 
652 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
653 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::equilibrateMatrix()
654 {
655  OrdinalType i, j;
656  int ierr = 0;
657 
658  if (equilibratedA_) return(0); // Already done.
659  if (R_.size()==0) ierr = computeEquilibrateScaling(); // Compute R if needed.
660  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr); // If return value is not zero, then can't equilibrate.
661  if (Matrix_->upper()) {
662  if (A_==AF_) {
663  ScalarType * ptr;
664  for (j=0; j<numRowCols_; j++) {
665  ptr = A_ + j*LDA_;
666  ScalarType s1 = R_[j];
667  for (i=0; i<=j; i++) {
668  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
669  ptr++;
670  }
671  }
672  }
673  else {
674  ScalarType * ptr;
675  ScalarType * ptr1;
676  for (j=0; j<numRowCols_; j++) {
677  ptr = A_ + j*LDA_;
678  ptr1 = AF_ + j*LDAF_;
679  ScalarType s1 = R_[j];
680  for (i=0; i<=j; i++) {
681  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
682  ptr++;
683  *ptr1 = *ptr1*s1*R_[i];
684  ptr1++;
685  }
686  }
687  }
688  }
689  else {
690  if (A_==AF_) {
691  ScalarType * ptr;
692  for (j=0; j<numRowCols_; j++) {
693  ptr = A_ + j + j*LDA_;
694  ScalarType s1 = R_[j];
695  for (i=j; i<numRowCols_; i++) {
696  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
697  ptr++;
698  }
699  }
700  }
701  else {
702  ScalarType * ptr;
703  ScalarType * ptr1;
704  for (j=0; j<numRowCols_; j++) {
705  ptr = A_ + j + j*LDA_;
706  ptr1 = AF_ + j + j*LDAF_;
707  ScalarType s1 = R_[j];
708  for (i=j; i<numRowCols_; i++) {
709  *ptr = *ptr*s1*R_[i];
710  ptr++;
711  *ptr1 = *ptr1*s1*R_[i];
712  ptr1++;
713  }
714  }
715  }
716  }
717 
718  equilibratedA_ = true;
719 
720  return(0);
721 }
722 
723 //=============================================================================
724 
725 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
726 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::equilibrateRHS()
727 {
728  OrdinalType i, j;
729  int ierr = 0;
730 
731  if (equilibratedB_) return(0); // Already done.
732  if (R_.size()==0) ierr = computeEquilibrateScaling(); // Compute R if needed.
733  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr); // Can't count on R being computed.
734 
735  OrdinalType LDB = RHS_->stride(), NRHS = RHS_->numCols();
736  ScalarType * B = RHS_->values();
737  ScalarType * ptr;
738  for (j=0; j<NRHS; j++) {
739  ptr = B + j*LDB;
740  for (i=0; i<numRowCols_; i++) {
741  *ptr = *ptr*R_[i];
742  ptr++;
743  }
744  }
745 
746  equilibratedB_ = true;
747 
748  return(0);
749 }
750 
751 //=============================================================================
752 
753 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
754 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::unequilibrateLHS()
755 {
756  OrdinalType i, j;
757 
758  if (!equilibratedB_) return(0); // Nothing to do
759 
760  OrdinalType LDX = LHS_->stride(), NLHS = LHS_->numCols();
761  ScalarType * X = LHS_->values();
762  ScalarType * ptr;
763  for (j=0; j<NLHS; j++) {
764  ptr = X + j*LDX;
765  for (i=0; i<numRowCols_; i++) {
766  *ptr = *ptr*R_[i];
767  ptr++;
768  }
769  }
770 
771  return(0);
772 }
773 
774 //=============================================================================
775 
776 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
777 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::invert()
778 {
779  if (!factored()) factor(); // Need matrix factored.
780 
781  INFO_ = 0;
782  this->POTRI( Matrix_->UPLO(), numRowCols_, AF_, LDAF_, &INFO_);
783 
784  // Copy lower/upper triangle to upper/lower triangle to make full inverse.
785  if (Matrix_->upper())
786  Matrix_->setLower();
787  else
788  Matrix_->setUpper();
789 
790  inverted_ = true;
791  factored_ = false;
792 
793  return(INFO_);
794 }
795 
796 //=============================================================================
797 
798 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
799 int SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::reciprocalConditionEstimate(MagnitudeType & Value)
800 {
801  if (reciprocalConditionEstimated()) {
802  Value = RCOND_;
803  return(0); // Already computed, just return it.
804  }
805 
806  if ( ANORM_<ScalarTraits<MagnitudeType>::zero() ) ANORM_ = Matrix_->normOne();
807 
808  int ierr = 0;
809  if (!factored()) ierr = factor(); // Need matrix factored.
810  if (ierr!=0) return(ierr);
811 
812  allocateWORK();
813  allocateIWORK();
814 
815  // We will assume a one-norm condition number
816  INFO_ = 0;
817  this->POCON( Matrix_->UPLO(), numRowCols_, AF_, LDAF_, ANORM_, &RCOND_, &WORK_[0], &IWORK_[0], &INFO_);
818  reciprocalConditionEstimated_ = true;
819  Value = RCOND_;
820 
821  return(INFO_);
822 }
823 //=============================================================================
824 
825 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
826 void SerialSpdDenseSolver<OrdinalType,ScalarType>::Print(std::ostream& os) const {
827
